entry.title: Friday: Fog dissipating. Temperature steady near minus 20 except high minus 10 over higher terrain.

entry.title: Friday night: Fog. Low minus 23 except minus 15 over higher terrain.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23 except minus 15 over higher terrain. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 30 December 2022
